query: dialog with R's persona: persona: i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to listen to rock music while working. i've three arabian horses. context:  R: beautiful horses . i have 2 dogs . Q: mostly country music , especially while i'm working on my cars . R: very cool . do you do anything on the weekend ? R: <extra_id_0>
answers: not really , i usually just work in the field and relax .
generation: i tend to the farm fields on the weekends.

passages.title: Samantha is Self-Sufficient
passages.text: My dad always taught me how to be self-sufficient. I even taught myself how to change a tyre on a car. One day my tyre blew while I was driving. I was able to properly change my tyre. I was very grateful to be able to get home safely.

passages.title: Bill Goes to Graduate School
passages.text: I decide that I want to pursue a master's degree after college. While my friends are all looking for jobs, I am applying for a school. At first I worried that I was making the wrong decision. However, when I get to graduate school, I feel great. I am proud that I will soon have a master's degree.

passages.title: Change Clothes
passages.text: I was at my grandma's house. They had just gotten back from my grandpa's funeral. Everyone was anxious to change into comfortable clothes. I was the last one in the house. I had to wait for a room to open so I could change.

passages.title: Going Home
passages.text: I am far from home. I miss my family. One day I realized I did not have to live far away. I moved home. My family was happy to have my back.

passages.title: Fireman
passages.text: I was turning 4 and told my mom my birthday wish. I wished to be a fireman for my birthday! My mom pondered this impossibility, then brightened. I set up a tour of the local fire station with its kind firemen. I got to be a foreman on my birthday after all!

passages.title: Freight.
passages.text: I wanted to travel but I did not have money. I decided to do some research and get on a train. I found out the nearest freight train goes to California. I planned it right and got on it. I then see other people on it.
